original_text: So the men went away. But they told everybody in that part of the country all about what Jesus had done for them.
korean_text: 그들이 나가서 예수의 소문을 그 온 땅에 퍼뜨리니라

sentences.original_text: in that part of the country
all about what Jesus had done for them
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 그들을 위해 행하신 모든 일에 대해
